review_data.title: El mejor restaurante de Zúrich
review_data.content: Comida excelente a un precio muy bueno. Sabor auténtico peruano con un servicio encantador. Muy recomendable.

review_data.title: Meeting with friends
review_data.content: I been in that place for my birthday with my friends. The food and the quality no good, the service so slow, just to wait the drinks was 45 minutes unbelievable, my dishes any taste. I don’t will recommend that place really 😞😞

The restaurant itself offers a simple familiar ambience perfect for a friends or family casual dining experience. There are a lot of Peruvian dishes especially “ceviche” (uncooked fish marinaded...More

review_data.title: Best peruvian cuisine

review_data.title: Fresh and very good

review_data.title: Very good value for money

review_data.title: Real Peruvian food

review_data.title: May worth going with somebody that knows the place :-)
review_data.content: Dear reader, Lola is probably the sole Peruvian restaurant in Zürich and it is worth tasting Peruvian specialties there. I visited the restaurant on Saturday 2nd February 2013 with two friends, one of them was Peruvian. This was the first time I ate Peruvian. The...More

review_data.title: El sabor del Perù - Der Geschmack von Perù
review_data.content: It's quite a shame to read the review of the fellow-gringo from the "slow" canton. I've been at Lola's many times, you can't get closer to the Peruvian Cuisine and lifestyle abroad of Perù, a lovely experience I can absolutely recommend this place to everyone,...More

review_data.title: Glorified Fish & Chips restaurant
review_data.content: I went to this restaurant with a group of people as a sort of exploratory dinner. It was rather disappointing compared to the excellent Peruvian cuisine I once had in Lima. The setting is that of a simple diner with nothing noticeably Peruvian about it....More
